title: Smart Data Models - WindPlantIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Simplified IEC type plant level model.   Reference: IEC 61400-27-1, AnnexE.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindPlantIEC

WindPlantFreqPcontrolIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind plant frequency and active power control model associated with this wind plant. Default: None

WindPlantReactiveControlIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind plant reactive control model associated with this wind plant. Default: None
